title: Holey.io Battle Royale
description: A unique battle royale game where you control a black hole and try to consume everything in a city. Grow larger by absorbing objects and other players, becoming an increasingly destructive force. Features physics-based gameplay in a 3D environment with colorful visuals and chaotic action.
how_to_play: Use your mouse or touch controls to move your black hole around the map. Start by consuming smaller objects to grow in size, then progress to larger structures and eventually other players. The larger your black hole becomes, the more objects you can absorb. Be the last player standing by consuming everything in your path!
